description:
As a Solutions Consultant for Agile Product Lifecycle Management (PLM), you will help refine and grow the capabilities of current systems, driving continuous improvement to meet our engineering needs. You will be responsible for design, develop and sustain PLM related application systems developed primarily using Oracle/Agile platform, Java and Oracle.

You will also serve to promote best practices and internal business processes with relation to change management and general PLM functions.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • 8 years of hands on Technical experience in Agile PLM.
  • Experience with inter-system interfaces between PLM and connected business systems.
  • Database experience.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience in end to end Agile PLM project implementation.
  • Technical design experience in Java, using Agile SDK, JSP, XML and WSX development.
  • Agile PLM customized reporting and publishing experience.
  • Experience with Agile PLM upgrades and integrations of Agile PLM with SAP and Oracle.
  • Ability to work with and influence peers and management and facilitate agreement among stakeholders with different interests. Ability to plan and execute projects independently.
  • Developed analysis, design and project management skills.
responsibilities:
• Provide technical system solutions for PLM systems primarily using Oracle Agile PLM.
  • Design and implement PLM solutions to meet business process and application requirements. Review and approve technical specifications and conduct code walk-through.
  • Work closely with the different technical teams and key stakeholders to understand requirements, managing software technical specifications and design documents, and develop and test the PLM applications and automations.
  • Drive the installation and infrastructure design decisions and maintenance.
  • Provide technical support for applications. Support the users and Agile analyst in troubleshooting both application and business process issues.
title: Solutions Consultant, Agile Product Lifecycle Management
